text: Ta [da wude wei ting duifang bianjie jiu] shuo:“Ta yaoqiu ni ba ni di na zhi mu mianyang bing ru ta de [99 zhi] mu mianyang zhong [cou zu 100 zhi], ta que yi qifu ni. You xuduo tongshi que shi huxiang qiru de, wei xinyang bing xingshan zhe liwai, dan zhexie ren shi shaoshu.” Da wude caixiang wo [an la] zai kaoyan ta, suoyi, ta bian qiu ta de zhu [an la] kuanshu [ta], bing baidao xiaqu, xiang an la huizui. Koutou chu
